com.googlecode.flickrjandroid.galleries
Class GalleriesInterface

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.flickrjandroid.galleries.GalleriesInterface

public class GalleriesInterface
extends Object

Represents the interface to get the gallery information from flickr.

Author:
charleszq@gmail.com

Method Detail

addPhoto

public void addPhoto(String galleryId,
                     String photoId,
                     String comment)
              throws IOException,
                     org.json.JSONException,
                     FlickrException
Add a photo to a gallery.

Parameters:
galleryId - The ID of the gallery to add a photo to. Note: this is the compound ID returned in methods like flickr.galleries.getList, and flickr.galleries.getListForPhoto.
photoId - photo ID to add to the gallery
comment - An optional short comment or story to accompany the photo.
Throws:
FlickrException
org.json.JSONException
IOException

getPhotos

public PhotoList getPhotos(String galleryId,
                           Set<String> extras,
                           int perPage,
                           int page)
                    throws IOException,
                           FlickrException,
                           org.json.JSONException
Return the list of photos for a gallery

Parameters:
galleryId - The ID of the gallery of photos to return
extras - An optional comma-delimited list of extra information to fetch for each returned record. Currently supported fields are: description, license, date_upload, date_taken, owner_name, icon_server, original_format, last_update, geo, tags, machine_tags, o_dims, views, media, path_alias, url_sq, url_t, url_s, url_m, url_z, url_l, url_o
perPage - Optional number of photos to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value is 500.
page - The Optional page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.
Returns:
Throws:
IOException
FlickrException
org.json.JSONException

getListForPhoto

public List<Gallery> getListForPhoto(String photoId,
                                     int perPage,
                                     int page)
                              throws IOException,
                                     FlickrException,
                                     org.json.JSONException
Return the list of galleries to which a photo has been added. Galleries are returned sorted by date which the photo was added to the gallery.

Parameters:
photoId - The ID of the photo to fetch a list of galleries for.
perPage - Optional number of galleries to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value is 500.
page - The optional page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.
Returns:
Throws:
IOException
FlickrException
org.json.JSONException

create

public String create(String title,
                     String description,
                     String primaryPhotoId)
              throws IOException,
                     FlickrException,
                     org.json.JSONException
Creates a gallery, return -1 says there is error, returns the gallery id if success.

Parameters:
title - The name of the gallery
description - A short description for the gallery
primaryPhotoId - The optional first photo to add to your gallery
Returns:
the gallery ID for successful creation
Throws:
IOException
FlickrException
org.json.JSONException

Modify the meta-data for a gallery.

Parameters:

                      String photoId,
                      String comment)
               throws IOException,
                      org.json.JSONException,
                      FlickrException
Edit the comment for a gallery photo.

Parameters:
galleryId - The ID of the gallery to add a photo to
photoId - The photo ID to add to the gallery
comment - The updated comment the photo
Throws:
IOException
org.json.JSONException
FlickrException

editPhotos

public void editPhotos(String galleryId,
                       String primaryPhotoId,
                       List<String> photoIds)
                throws IOException,
                       org.json.JSONException,
                       FlickrException
Modify the photos in a gallery. Use this method to add, remove and re-order photos.

Parameters:
galleryId - The id of the gallery to modify. The gallery must belong to the calling user.
primaryPhotoId - The id of the photo to use as the 'primary' photo for the gallery. This id must also be passed along in photo_ids list argument.
photoIds - A comma-delimited list of photo ids to include in the gallery. They will appear in the set in the order sent. This list must contain the primary photo id. This list of photos replaces the existing list.
Throws:
IOException
org.json.JSONException
FlickrException
